question: Where was Ed Wood born?
oriSent: He was born on October 10, 1924, in Poughkeepsie, New York, and died on December 10, 1978, in Hollywood, California.

oriSent: Scott Derrickson is an American filmmaker who was born on July 27, 1963, in Denver, Colorado.
